DocAttribute.Name: RelatingStructuralMember
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to an instance of IfcStructuralMember (or its subclasses) which is connected to the specified structural connection.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedStructuralConnection
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to an instance of IfcStructuralConnection (or its subclasses) which is connected to the specified structural member.

DocAttribute.Name: AppliedCondition
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Reference to an instance of _IfcBoundaryCondition_ which is used to define the connections properties.
> <font size="-1"> NOTE  The boundary condition applied to a member-connection-relationship is also called "release"</font>

DocAttribute.Name: AdditionalConditions
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to instances describing additional connection properties.

DocAttribute.Name: SupportedLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines the 'supported length' of this structural connection. See Fig. for more detail.

DocAttribute.Name: ConditionCoordinateSystem
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines a new coordinate system used for the description of the connection properties. The usage of this coordinate system is described more detailed in the definition of the subtypes of this entity definition.
